授業の概要・背景: This course will examine at the biography of Robert Louis Stevenson and this three most famous works: Treasure Island, Kidnapped, and the Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde.
授業方法: This course will be held face-to-face.

第1回:
All 14 sessions are conducted Face to face
Class Orientation.
Who was Robert Louis Stevenson?
What kind of time and place did RLS live and write in.
第14回:
Student Presentations.
Final Papers are due.
University and Instructor feedback.
